detail_desc: Boots in imitation leather and imitation suede with lacing. Faux fur linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform 3 cm.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, and a fake welt pocket with a button at the back.
Scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.
Watch with a rectangular metal face and imitation leather strap.
Jumper in a fine, airy knit containing glittery threads with a round neck, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, pointelle cotton with a decorative lace trim around the neckline and armholes, and press-studs at the crotch.
Pleated skirt in a checked weave with a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Push-up bra in lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long T-shirt in soft jersey containing some linen with short sleeves, a roll edge around the neckline and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Short-sleeved dress in fine-knit cotton with a ribbed neckline.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Some of the polyester content of the top is recycled.
Jumper in a soft, fine, airy knit with long sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Short mesh shirt jacket with a collar, buttons down the front and side pockets. Long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Unlined.
Sock-style court shoes in imitation leather with a jersey top section, pointed toes and covered heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6 cm.
Straight-cut top in woven fabric in a double layer with a wide flounce at the top.
Cardigan in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a draped front, long sleeves and no buttons.
Sleeveless top in ribbed cotton jersey with a round neckline and decorative buttons at the top.
Wide, straight-cut dress in cotton jersey with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.
Ankle-length trousers in washed twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight, wide legs.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Shirt in a checked weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.

Studio Collection. Transparent body in stretch, patterned mesh with neat lace trims. Deep V-neck, long sleeves, a lined gusset with press-studs, and cutaway coverage at the back. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Trainers in mesh with imitation leather details, a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Top in a stretch rib knit with an off-centre V-neck and short sleeves.
High-waisted, fitted skirt.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with print motif on the front, a jersey-lined hood and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in ribbed jersey with narrow shoulder straps and an overlocked edge at the hem.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a covered elastic waistband. Lined.
Lace thong briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a decorative tie-detail at the hem.

Short, fitted dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt that fastens at one side.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front, buttons on one shoulder, a drawstring waist and long legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Santa Claus costume in soft fabric designed for a small dog. Hook and loop fastenings around the neck and underneath.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric. Slightly looser fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Round metal earrings with hoop pendants. Length 3.5 cm.
Calf-length, pleated wrapover skirt in airy, crinkled fabric with a concealed button at the waist. Twill waistband with a satin trim and satin-covered buckle at the side. Lined.
Fitted shirt in a stretch weave made from a cotton blend with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Joggers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and covered elastic at the hems.
Leather boots with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 4 cm.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and slits in the sides of the hem.

Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and half-string back.
Shirt in an airy cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Short, sleeveless dress in jersey with a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a metal buckle at the front. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Thong briefs in microfibre and mesh with a low waist, decorative straps at the top, a lined gusset, narrow sides and string back. The briefs are made partly from recycled polyamide.
Fine-knit, V-neck jumper with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
V-neck top in softly draping, patterned viscose jersey with a lace yoke at the back. Short, lace butterfly sleeves and an elasticated seam under the bust.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Cargo trousers in cotton twill with side pockets, back pockets with a button and flap leg pockets with a button. Zip fly and button, and slim, tapered legs.

Set with a pair of dungarees in soft, stretch denim and long-sleeved bodysuit in soft, patterned cotton jersey. Dungarees with a chest pocket, straps with adjustable fasteners, fake front pockets and a fake fly. Concealed press-stud at the sides, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (except in sizes 1-4Y) and covered elastication at the hems. Soft jersey lining at the top. Bodysuit with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch. The cotton content of the dungarees is partly recycled.
Satin cami top with a lace trim, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and gentle draping at the top.

Set with a short-sleeved bodysuit and pair of shorts with straps in an organic cotton blend. Bodysuit in soft jersey with buttons at the top, press-studs at the crotch and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts in an airy textured weave with patch front pockets, sewn-in turn-ups at the hems and straps that cross at the back and button at the front.
Trainers in cotton chambray with a concealed elastic gore at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.
3/4-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing and a concealed key pocket in the waistband.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Flat sandals with wide crossover foot straps and an elastic strap at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Leggings in sturdy organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist. Soft brushed inside.
Short, sleeveless sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with wrapover draping at the front.

Denim shorts with a regular waist and button fly. Side pockets, a coin pocket with a button and three back pockets, one of which is a welt pocket with a button. Straight legs with shaping seams that have longer hems at the front. Straight fit.
Knee-length skirt in a pleated weave. High waist with covered elastication, a sewn-in wrapover at the front and an asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Short dress in a washed viscose weave with a round neck, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short dress in stretch jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud. Short cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Set with a top and shorts in cotton jersey. Patterned vest top with a frill-trimmed, rounded hem. Shorts with elastication and a drawstring at the waist.

Fitted blouse in washed cotton denim with a square neckline front and back and covered buttons down the front. Wide, covered elastication over the shoulders and short, voluminous puff sleeves with narrow elastication.

CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Long dress in lightweight, jacquard-weave viscose made partly from Circulose® Re:Newcell with a sheen. Deep V-neck with two wide flounces that fall over the shoulders and continue down the back, and horizontal grosgrain ties that fasten at the back. The dress is fitted at the top and relaxes from the waist down into a softly draping, voluminous skirt with a slit at the front. Concealed zip at the back. Recycled polyester lining. Circulose® Re:Newcell is a material made from cotton extracted from used fabrics. Its production has minimal impact on the climate, water consumption and deforestation.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake jetted back pocket with a button.
5-pocket shorts in washed cotton denim with embroidery on the front. High waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Short dress in airy chiffon made from recycled polyester with a deep, pleated V-neck. Long sleeves with gathers and a covered button at the cuffs. Close-fitting at the top, a tapered waist with an asymmetric seam, and a gently draping skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Concealed zip in one side made partly from recycled polyester. Recycled polyester lining.
Metal hair clips in various sizes and designs.
Short, fitted skirt in glittery stretch jersey with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, gathers at one side and an asymmetric hem. Concealed elastication at the waist. Partly lined.
